name: movie_suggestions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool list_movies_v3.
Tool description: This Movies API contains the data of the best movies ever made in a very easy-to-use and organized format.

Great choice for REST API based Frontend Developer Projects.

In the case of accessing the complete list, the Cover image, Rank, Title, Thumbnail, Rating, Id, Year, Images, Description, Trailer, Genre, Director, Writer and ID of the movies are listed.

This is a lightweight web service, (REST interface), which provides an easy way to access our database.

An API (Application programming...
API description: Returns 4 related movies as suggestions for the user

movie_id.description: The ID of the movie for which to get related suggestions. Defaults to 10.
